intro: Guettarda cahosiana, commonly known as the Caribbean guettarda, is a flowering plant native to the Caribbean region. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its evergreen foliage and produces small, fragrant white flowers. It typically grows in coastal areas and is adapted to saline environments. Guettarda cahosiana is often used in ornamental gardening due to its attractive appearance and hardy nature.
